Feedback

We value your feedback! Please let us know your suggestions, bug reports, feature requests, or anything you want to share. Your input helps us make 2048.city better for everyone.

What Can I Submit?

  • Bug reports (gameplay, UI, login, etc.)
  • Feature requests (new modes, UI ideas, etc.)
  • General suggestions or feedback

Privacy Promise

Your feedback is kept private and only used to improve the site. No personal data is shared or sold.
